GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: UNCOVERED: catspiracy to bring down democracy
articles.author: rogersop

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: fetches an object of inputted article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to comments with relevant article ID, responds with the comment posted

comment.body: I am the comment you want to input
comment.author: rogersop

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: patches an article, by its article_id, and changes the number of votes on an article
